keyword: things to do in perth australia
references_text: FOMO Festive Fair, an open-air market, offers a curated selection of gifts, design goods, artworks, vintage items suitable for gif...
references_markdown:
Outdoor activities

- **[Kings Park](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/07kc_b&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBBAC) and [Botanic Garden](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/07kc_b&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBBAE)** : This large inner-city park is an essential destination for both visitors and locals . You can admire panoramic views of the Perth skyline and Swan River, explore the Western Australian Botanic Garden which features over 3,000 species of native flora, and discover walking trails like the [Lotterywest Federation Walkway](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/11f1lbdhff&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBBAH) , which includes a treetop walk . The park also contains various children's play areas, barbecue facilities, and monuments such as the [State War Memorial](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/1w604csr&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBBAJ).
- **[Rottnest Island](https://www.google.com/search?q=Rottnest+Island&kgmid=/m/01fmx4&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQ3egRegQIBBAM)** : Just a short ferry ride from Perth or Fremantle, this island is home to the famous quokkas. With 63 white-sand beaches and 20 bays, you can spend time swimming and snorkelling . Other activities include cycling, hiking the Wadjemup Bidi trails, guided Segway tours, and skydiving.
- **[Swan River](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/0mg9j&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBBAQ)** : Explore the waterways with a river cruise, which often depart from [Barrack Street Jetty](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/11ngj7jcvf&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBBAS) . You can also rent kayaks to paddle along the Canning River, where you can see waterbirds and natural vegetation.
- **Beaches** : Enjoy Perth's beautiful coastline, with numerous beaches perfect for swimming, surfing, and relaxing. Popular options include [Cottesloe Beach](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/11shf3bqjf&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBBAV) , known for its pristine sand and clear water, and [Scarborough Beach](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/1q62bcb3k&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBBAX) , with its vibrant foreshore and dining options.
- **[Elizabeth Quay](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/0k0jptp&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBBAa)** : Take a cultural walking tour or simply enjoy the public art and city views at this vibrant waterfront precinct . You can also see the [Bell Tower](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/07dd0h&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBBAc) here, which is celebrating its 25th anniversary with a free entry event in December.[[1]](https://www.destinationperth.com.au/explore-perth/perth-city/kings-park/#:~:text=Kings%20Park%20and%20Botanic%20Garden,the%20Kimberley%20region%20of%20WA.)[[2]](https://www.bgpa.wa.gov.au/kings-park#:~:text=Kings%20Park%20is%20both%20one,Kings%20Park%20Bushland)[[3]](https://rottnestexpress.com.au/#:~:text=Just%20a%20short%20ferry%20ride,does%20have%20something%20for%20everyone.)[[4]](https://www.destinationperth.com.au/explore-perth/rottnest-island/#:~:text=You%20won't%20be%20left,backdrop%20to%20your%20forever%20memories.)[[5]](https://www.rottnestisland.com/visit/guides-tips/an-unforgettable-group-getaway-to-rottnest-island)[[6]](https://www.destinationperth.com.au/event/christmas-dinner-cruise/4160/)[[7]](https://megatix.com.au/events/all-abilities-river-cruise)[[8]](https://www.eventbrite.com/e/1963684017758)[[9]](https://allevents.in/perth/elizabeth-quay-cultural-walking-tours/80001491517541)[[10]](https://www.westernaustralia.com/en/event/25th-anniversary-of-the-bell-tower/689c17547eb93ff921a7a4ab)

Arts, culture, and entertainment

- **[Fremantle](https://www.google.com/search?q=Fremantle&kgmid=/m/012q8y&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQ3egRegQIBxAC)** : This historic port city has a distinct character with colonial architecture and a bustling creative scene . You can browse local artisan goods at the Bazaar Makers Market in early December or visit one of the many cafes, pubs, and restaurants.
- **Events and Markets** : Search for one-off events like the *FOMO Festive Fair* in Fremantle or the *Bayswater Twilight Market* . You can also catch a live show, with options ranging from jazz at [The Ellington Jazz Club](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/0k529bx&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBxAG) to a Beatles tribute on a river cruise.
- **Museums** : Visit [Scitech](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/0ffw5f&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBxAJ) for a hands-on science experience or the [Wadjemup Museum](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/11cjpcgxs3&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBxAL) on Rottnest Island to learn about the island's unique history and Aboriginal culture . The [Fremantle Arts Centre](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/0d4yqf&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBxAN) is another option for art classes, curator tours, and live music.[[1]](https://www.facebook.com/events/1471858014105645/?acontext=%7B%22action_history%22%3A%22null%22%7D&ref_source=newsfeed&ref_mechanism=feed_attachment)[[2]](https://www.eventbrite.com/e/1966807331674)[[3]](https://www.facebook.com/events/10-william-st-fremantle-wa-australia-western-australia-6160/fomo-festive-fair/1419132312509181/)[[4]](https://www.facebook.com/events/bert-wright-park-king-william-street-bayswater-perth-wa-australia-western-austra/bayswater-twilight-market/1286412152937331/)[[5]](https://www.facebook.com/events/1824862041479846/?acontext=%7B%22action_history%22%3A%22null%22%7D&ref_source=newsfeed&ref_mechanism=feed_attachment)[[6]](https://www.facebook.com/events/964171005793931)[[7]](https://www.facebook.com/events/scitech/planetarium-experience-pink-floyds-dark-side-of-the-moon/605423132501478/)[[8]](https://www.destinationperth.com.au/explore-perth/rottnest-island/#:~:text=You%20won't%20be%20left,backdrop%20to%20your%20forever%20memories.)

Family-friendly activities

- **Pottery Workshop** : Get creative with the whole family at a pottery workshop at the [Not Yet Perfect Pottery Studio](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/11ptlh6chs&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIChAC) in Applecross.
- **Family Fun Day** : Look for family-oriented events like the *Teddy Bears Picnic* at [BrewDog Perth](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/11vjvpw9vw&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIChAF) or the *Family Sundays* at [Kings Park and Botanic Garden](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/07kc_b&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIChAH).
- **Theater** : Take the family to see a production like *Cinderella* at [His Majesty's Theatre](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/0c494p&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIChAK) in Perth.
- **Nature Play** : At [Kings Park](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/07kc_b&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIChAN) , children can connect with nature at [Rio Tinto Naturescape](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/11c1qbs_py&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIChAP) , a place for children to learn about the environment.[[1]](https://www.notyetperfect.com/event-details/family-pottery-workshop-wheel-work-2025-11-30-12-30-1)[[2]](https://brewdogperth.com.au/events/teddy-bears-picnic/)[[3]](https://www.westernaustralia.com/en/event/warrior-world%3A-family-sundays/68538ca9a86647e01658c913)[[4]](https://limelight-arts.com.au/event/cinderella/2025-11-28/)[[5]](https://www.destinationperth.com.au/explore-perth/perth-city/kings-park/#:~:text=Kings%20Park%20and%20Botanic%20Garden,the%20Kimberley%20region%20of%20WA.)

- **[Rottnest Island](https://www.google.com/search?q=Rottnest+Island&kgmid=/m/01fmx4&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQ3egRegQIBBAM)** : Just a short ferry ride from Perth or Fremantle, this island is home to the famous quokkas. With 63 white-sand beaches and 20 bays, you can spend time swimming and snorkelling . Other activities include cycling, hiking the Wadjemup Bidi trails, guided Segway tours, and skydiving.
- **[Swan River](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/0mg9j&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBBAQ)** : Explore the waterways with a river cruise, which often depart from [Barrack Street Jetty](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/11ngj7jcvf&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBBAS) . You can also rent kayaks to paddle along the Canning River, where you can see waterbirds and natural vegetation.
- **Beaches** : Enjoy Perth's beautiful coastline, with numerous beaches perfect for swimming, surfing, and relaxing. Popular options include [Cottesloe Beach](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/11shf3bqjf&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBBAV) , known for its pristine sand and clear water, and [Scarborough Beach](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/1q62bcb3k&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBBAX) , with its vibrant foreshore and dining options.
- **[Elizabeth Quay](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/0k0jptp&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBBAa)** : Take a cultural walking tour or simply enjoy the public art and city views at this vibrant waterfront precinct . You can also see the [Bell Tower](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/07dd0h&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBBAc) here, which is celebrating its 25th anniversary with a free entry event in December.[[1]](https://www.destinationperth.com.au/explore-perth/perth-city/kings-park/#:~:text=Kings%20Park%20and%20Botanic%20Garden,the%20Kimberley%20region%20of%20WA.)[[2]](https://www.bgpa.wa.gov.au/kings-park#:~:text=Kings%20Park%20is%20both%20one,Kings%20Park%20Bushland)[[3]](https://rottnestexpress.com.au/#:~:text=Just%20a%20short%20ferry%20ride,does%20have%20something%20for%20everyone.)[[4]](https://www.destinationperth.com.au/explore-perth/rottnest-island/#:~:text=You%20won't%20be%20left,backdrop%20to%20your%20forever%20memories.)[[5]](https://www.rottnestisland.com/visit/guides-tips/an-unforgettable-group-getaway-to-rottnest-island)[[6]](https://www.destinationperth.com.au/event/christmas-dinner-cruise/4160/)[[7]](https://megatix.com.au/events/all-abilities-river-cruise)[[8]](https://www.eventbrite.com/e/1963684017758)[[9]](https://allevents.in/perth/elizabeth-quay-cultural-walking-tours/80001491517541)[[10]](https://www.westernaustralia.com/en/event/25th-anniversary-of-the-bell-tower/689c17547eb93ff921a7a4ab)

Arts, culture, and entertainment

- **[Fremantle](https://www.google.com/search?q=Fremantle&kgmid=/m/012q8y&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQ3egRegQIBxAC)** : This historic port city has a distinct character with colonial architecture and a bustling creative scene . You can browse local artisan goods at the Bazaar Makers Market in early December or visit one of the many cafes, pubs, and restaurants.
- **Events and Markets** : Search for one-off events like the *FOMO Festive Fair* in Fremantle or the *Bayswater Twilight Market* . You can also catch a live show, with options ranging from jazz at [The Ellington Jazz Club](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/0k529bx&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBxAG) to a Beatles tribute on a river cruise.
- **Museums** : Visit [Scitech](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/0ffw5f&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBxAJ) for a hands-on science experience or the [Wadjemup Museum](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/11cjpcgxs3&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBxAL) on Rottnest Island to learn about the island's unique history and Aboriginal culture . The [Fremantle Arts Centre](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/0d4yqf&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBxAN) is another option for art classes, curator tours, and live music.[[1]](https://www.facebook.com/events/1471858014105645/?acontext=%7B%22action_history%22%3A%22null%22%7D&ref_source=newsfeed&ref_mechanism=feed_attachment)[[2]](https://www.eventbrite.com/e/1966807331674)[[3]](https://www.facebook.com/events/10-william-st-fremantle-wa-australia-western-australia-6160/fomo-festive-fair/1419132312509181/)[[4]](https://www.facebook.com/events/bert-wright-park-king-william-street-bayswater-perth-wa-australia-western-austra/bayswater-twilight-market/1286412152937331/)[[5]](https://www.facebook.com/events/1824862041479846/?acontext=%7B%22action_history%22%3A%22null%22%7D&ref_source=newsfeed&ref_mechanism=feed_attachment)[[6]](https://www.facebook.com/events/964171005793931)[[7]](https://www.facebook.com/events/scitech/planetarium-experience-pink-floyds-dark-side-of-the-moon/605423132501478/)[[8]](https://www.destinationperth.com.au/explore-perth/rottnest-island/#:~:text=You%20won't%20be%20left,backdrop%20to%20your%20forever%20memories.)

Family-friendly activities

- **Pottery Workshop** : Get creative with the whole family at a pottery workshop at the [Not Yet Perfect Pottery Studio](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/11ptlh6chs&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIChAC) in Applecross.
- **Family Fun Day** : Look for family-oriented events like the *Teddy Bears Picnic* at [BrewDog Perth](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/11vjvpw9vw&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIChAF) or the *Family Sundays* at [Kings Park and Botanic Garden](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/07kc_b&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIChAH).
- **Theater** : Take the family to see a production like *Cinderella* at [His Majesty's Theatre](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/0c494p&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIChAK) in Perth.
- **Nature Play** : At [Kings Park](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/07kc_b&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIChAN) , children can connect with nature at [Rio Tinto Naturescape](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/11c1qbs_py&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIChAP) , a place for children to learn about the environment.[[1]](https://www.notyetperfect.com/event-details/family-pottery-workshop-wheel-work-2025-11-30-12-30-1)[[2]](https://brewdogperth.com.au/events/teddy-bears-picnic/)[[3]](https://www.westernaustralia.com/en/event/warrior-world%3A-family-sundays/68538ca9a86647e01658c913)[[4]](https://limelight-arts.com.au/event/cinderella/2025-11-28/)[[5]](https://www.destinationperth.com.au/explore-perth/perth-city/kings-park/#:~:text=Kings%20Park%20and%20Botanic%20Garden,the%20Kimberley%20region%20of%20WA.)

references_markdown:
Outdoor activities

- **[Kings Park](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/07kc_b&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBBAC) and [Botanic Garden](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/07kc_b&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBBAE)** : This large inner-city park is an essential destination for both visitors and locals . You can admire panoramic views of the Perth skyline and Swan River, explore the Western Australian Botanic Garden which features over 3,000 species of native flora, and discover walking trails like the [Lotterywest Federation Walkway](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/11f1lbdhff&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBBAH) , which includes a treetop walk . The park also contains various children's play areas, barbecue facilities, and monuments such as the [State War Memorial](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/1w604csr&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBBAJ).
- **[Rottnest Island](https://www.google.com/search?q=Rottnest+Island&kgmid=/m/01fmx4&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQ3egRegQIBBAM)** : Just a short ferry ride from Perth or Fremantle, this island is home to the famous quokkas. With 63 white-sand beaches and 20 bays, you can spend time swimming and snorkelling . Other activities include cycling, hiking the Wadjemup Bidi trails, guided Segway tours, and skydiving.
- **[Swan River](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/0mg9j&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBBAQ)** : Explore the waterways with a river cruise, which often depart from [Barrack Street Jetty](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/11ngj7jcvf&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBBAS) . You can also rent kayaks to paddle along the Canning River, where you can see waterbirds and natural vegetation.
- **Beaches** : Enjoy Perth's beautiful coastline, with numerous beaches perfect for swimming, surfing, and relaxing. Popular options include [Cottesloe Beach](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/11shf3bqjf&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBBAV) , known for its pristine sand and clear water, and [Scarborough Beach](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/1q62bcb3k&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBBAX) , with its vibrant foreshore and dining options.
- **[Elizabeth Quay](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/0k0jptp&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBBAa)** : Take a cultural walking tour or simply enjoy the public art and city views at this vibrant waterfront precinct . You can also see the [Bell Tower](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/07dd0h&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBBAc) here, which is celebrating its 25th anniversary with a free entry event in December.[[1]](https://www.destinationperth.com.au/explore-perth/perth-city/kings-park/#:~:text=Kings%20Park%20and%20Botanic%20Garden,the%20Kimberley%20region%20of%20WA.)[[2]](https://www.bgpa.wa.gov.au/kings-park#:~:text=Kings%20Park%20is%20both%20one,Kings%20Park%20Bushland)[[3]](https://rottnestexpress.com.au/#:~:text=Just%20a%20short%20ferry%20ride,does%20have%20something%20for%20everyone.)[[4]](https://www.destinationperth.com.au/explore-perth/rottnest-island/#:~:text=You%20won't%20be%20left,backdrop%20to%20your%20forever%20memories.)[[5]](https://www.rottnestisland.com/visit/guides-tips/an-unforgettable-group-getaway-to-rottnest-island)[[6]](https://www.destinationperth.com.au/event/christmas-dinner-cruise/4160/)[[7]](https://megatix.com.au/events/all-abilities-river-cruise)[[8]](https://www.eventbrite.com/e/1963684017758)[[9]](https://allevents.in/perth/elizabeth-quay-cultural-walking-tours/80001491517541)[[10]](https://www.westernaustralia.com/en/event/25th-anniversary-of-the-bell-tower/689c17547eb93ff921a7a4ab)

Arts, culture, and entertainment

- **[Fremantle](https://www.google.com/search?q=Fremantle&kgmid=/m/012q8y&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQ3egRegQIBxAC)** : This historic port city has a distinct character with colonial architecture and a bustling creative scene . You can browse local artisan goods at the Bazaar Makers Market in early December or visit one of the many cafes, pubs, and restaurants.
- **Events and Markets** : Search for one-off events like the *FOMO Festive Fair* in Fremantle or the *Bayswater Twilight Market* . You can also catch a live show, with options ranging from jazz at [The Ellington Jazz Club](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/0k529bx&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBxAG) to a Beatles tribute on a river cruise.
- **Museums** : Visit [Scitech](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/0ffw5f&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBxAJ) for a hands-on science experience or the [Wadjemup Museum](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/11cjpcgxs3&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBxAL) on Rottnest Island to learn about the island's unique history and Aboriginal culture . The [Fremantle Arts Centre](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/0d4yqf&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBxAN) is another option for art classes, curator tours, and live music.[[1]](https://www.facebook.com/events/1471858014105645/?acontext=%7B%22action_history%22%3A%22null%22%7D&ref_source=newsfeed&ref_mechanism=feed_attachment)[[2]](https://www.eventbrite.com/e/1966807331674)[[3]](https://www.facebook.com/events/10-william-st-fremantle-wa-australia-western-australia-6160/fomo-festive-fair/1419132312509181/)[[4]](https://www.facebook.com/events/bert-wright-park-king-william-street-bayswater-perth-wa-australia-western-austra/bayswater-twilight-market/1286412152937331/)[[5]](https://www.facebook.com/events/1824862041479846/?acontext=%7B%22action_history%22%3A%22null%22%7D&ref_source=newsfeed&ref_mechanism=feed_attachment)[[6]](https://www.facebook.com/events/964171005793931)[[7]](https://www.facebook.com/events/scitech/planetarium-experience-pink-floyds-dark-side-of-the-moon/605423132501478/)[[8]](https://www.destinationperth.com.au/explore-perth/rottnest-island/#:~:text=You%20won't%20be%20left,backdrop%20to%20your%20forever%20memories.)

Family-friendly activities

- **Pottery Workshop** : Get creative with the whole family at a pottery workshop at the [Not Yet Perfect Pottery Studio](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/11ptlh6chs&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIChAC) in Applecross.
- **Family Fun Day** : Look for family-oriented events like the *Teddy Bears Picnic* at [BrewDog Perth](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/11vjvpw9vw&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIChAF) or the *Family Sundays* at [Kings Park and Botanic Garden](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/07kc_b&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIChAH).
- **Theater** : Take the family to see a production like *Cinderella* at [His Majesty's Theatre](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/0c494p&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIChAK) in Perth.
- **Nature Play** : At [Kings Park](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/07kc_b&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIChAN) , children can connect with nature at [Rio Tinto Naturescape](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/11c1qbs_py&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIChAP) , a place for children to learn about the environment.[[1]](https://www.notyetperfect.com/event-details/family-pottery-workshop-wheel-work-2025-11-30-12-30-1)[[2]](https://brewdogperth.com.au/events/teddy-bears-picnic/)[[3]](https://www.westernaustralia.com/en/event/warrior-world%3A-family-sundays/68538ca9a86647e01658c913)[[4]](https://limelight-arts.com.au/event/cinderella/2025-11-28/)[[5]](https://www.destinationperth.com.au/explore-perth/perth-city/kings-park/#:~:text=Kings%20Park%20and%20Botanic%20Garden,the%20Kimberley%20region%20of%20WA.)

references_markdown:
Outdoor activities

- **[Kings Park](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/07kc_b&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBBAC) and [Botanic Garden](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/07kc_b&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBBAE)** : This large inner-city park is an essential destination for both visitors and locals . You can admire panoramic views of the Perth skyline and Swan River, explore the Western Australian Botanic Garden which features over 3,000 species of native flora, and discover walking trails like the [Lotterywest Federation Walkway](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/11f1lbdhff&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBBAH) , which includes a treetop walk . The park also contains various children's play areas, barbecue facilities, and monuments such as the [State War Memorial](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/1w604csr&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBBAJ).
- **[Rottnest Island](https://www.google.com/search?q=Rottnest+Island&kgmid=/m/01fmx4&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQ3egRegQIBBAM)** : Just a short ferry ride from Perth or Fremantle, this island is home to the famous quokkas. With 63 white-sand beaches and 20 bays, you can spend time swimming and snorkelling . Other activities include cycling, hiking the Wadjemup Bidi trails, guided Segway tours, and skydiving.
- **[Swan River](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/0mg9j&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBBAQ)** : Explore the waterways with a river cruise, which often depart from [Barrack Street Jetty](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/11ngj7jcvf&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBBAS) . You can also rent kayaks to paddle along the Canning River, where you can see waterbirds and natural vegetation.
- **Beaches** : Enjoy Perth's beautiful coastline, with numerous beaches perfect for swimming, surfing, and relaxing. Popular options include [Cottesloe Beach](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/11shf3bqjf&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBBAV) , known for its pristine sand and clear water, and [Scarborough Beach](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/1q62bcb3k&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBBAX) , with its vibrant foreshore and dining options.
- **[Elizabeth Quay](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/0k0jptp&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBBAa)** : Take a cultural walking tour or simply enjoy the public art and city views at this vibrant waterfront precinct . You can also see the [Bell Tower](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/07dd0h&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBBAc) here, which is celebrating its 25th anniversary with a free entry event in December.[[1]](https://www.destinationperth.com.au/explore-perth/perth-city/kings-park/#:~:text=Kings%20Park%20and%20Botanic%20Garden,the%20Kimberley%20region%20of%20WA.)[[2]](https://www.bgpa.wa.gov.au/kings-park#:~:text=Kings%20Park%20is%20both%20one,Kings%20Park%20Bushland)[[3]](https://rottnestexpress.com.au/#:~:text=Just%20a%20short%20ferry%20ride,does%20have%20something%20for%20everyone.)[[4]](https://www.destinationperth.com.au/explore-perth/rottnest-island/#:~:text=You%20won't%20be%20left,backdrop%20to%20your%20forever%20memories.)[[5]](https://www.rottnestisland.com/visit/guides-tips/an-unforgettable-group-getaway-to-rottnest-island)[[6]](https://www.destinationperth.com.au/event/christmas-dinner-cruise/4160/)[[7]](https://megatix.com.au/events/all-abilities-river-cruise)[[8]](https://www.eventbrite.com/e/1963684017758)[[9]](https://allevents.in/perth/elizabeth-quay-cultural-walking-tours/80001491517541)[[10]](https://www.westernaustralia.com/en/event/25th-anniversary-of-the-bell-tower/689c17547eb93ff921a7a4ab)

Arts, culture, and entertainment

- **[Fremantle](https://www.google.com/search?q=Fremantle&kgmid=/m/012q8y&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQ3egRegQIBxAC)** : This historic port city has a distinct character with colonial architecture and a bustling creative scene . You can browse local artisan goods at the Bazaar Makers Market in early December or visit one of the many cafes, pubs, and restaurants.
- **Events and Markets** : Search for one-off events like the *FOMO Festive Fair* in Fremantle or the *Bayswater Twilight Market* . You can also catch a live show, with options ranging from jazz at [The Ellington Jazz Club](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/0k529bx&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBxAG) to a Beatles tribute on a river cruise.
- **Museums** : Visit [Scitech](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/0ffw5f&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBxAJ) for a hands-on science experience or the [Wadjemup Museum](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/11cjpcgxs3&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBxAL) on Rottnest Island to learn about the island's unique history and Aboriginal culture . The [Fremantle Arts Centre](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/0d4yqf&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBxAN) is another option for art classes, curator tours, and live music.[[1]](https://www.facebook.com/events/1471858014105645/?acontext=%7B%22action_history%22%3A%22null%22%7D&ref_source=newsfeed&ref_mechanism=feed_attachment)[[2]](https://www.eventbrite.com/e/1966807331674)[[3]](https://www.facebook.com/events/10-william-st-fremantle-wa-australia-western-australia-6160/fomo-festive-fair/1419132312509181/)[[4]](https://www.facebook.com/events/bert-wright-park-king-william-street-bayswater-perth-wa-australia-western-austra/bayswater-twilight-market/1286412152937331/)[[5]](https://www.facebook.com/events/1824862041479846/?acontext=%7B%22action_history%22%3A%22null%22%7D&ref_source=newsfeed&ref_mechanism=feed_attachment)[[6]](https://www.facebook.com/events/964171005793931)[[7]](https://www.facebook.com/events/scitech/planetarium-experience-pink-floyds-dark-side-of-the-moon/605423132501478/)[[8]](https://www.destinationperth.com.au/explore-perth/rottnest-island/#:~:text=You%20won't%20be%20left,backdrop%20to%20your%20forever%20memories.)

Family-friendly activities

- **Pottery Workshop** : Get creative with the whole family at a pottery workshop at the [Not Yet Perfect Pottery Studio](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/11ptlh6chs&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIChAC) in Applecross.
- **Family Fun Day** : Look for family-oriented events like the *Teddy Bears Picnic* at [BrewDog Perth](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/11vjvpw9vw&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIChAF) or the *Family Sundays* at [Kings Park and Botanic Garden](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/07kc_b&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIChAH).
- **Theater** : Take the family to see a production like *Cinderella* at [His Majesty's Theatre](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/0c494p&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIChAK) in Perth.
- **Nature Play** : At [Kings Park](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/07kc_b&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIChAN) , children can connect with nature at [Rio Tinto Naturescape](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/11c1qbs_py&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIChAP) , a place for children to learn about the environment.[[1]](https://www.notyetperfect.com/event-details/family-pottery-workshop-wheel-work-2025-11-30-12-30-1)[[2]](https://brewdogperth.com.au/events/teddy-bears-picnic/)[[3]](https://www.westernaustralia.com/en/event/warrior-world%3A-family-sundays/68538ca9a86647e01658c913)[[4]](https://limelight-arts.com.au/event/cinderella/2025-11-28/)[[5]](https://www.destinationperth.com.au/explore-perth/perth-city/kings-park/#:~:text=Kings%20Park%20and%20Botanic%20Garden,the%20Kimberley%20region%20of%20WA.)

references_text: An immersive, full-dome and surround sound planetarium show celebrating the 50th anniversary of Pink Floyd’s "The Dark Side of the...
references_markdown:
Outdoor activities

- **[Kings Park](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/07kc_b&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBBAC) and [Botanic Garden](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/07kc_b&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBBAE)** : This large inner-city park is an essential destination for both visitors and locals . You can admire panoramic views of the Perth skyline and Swan River, explore the Western Australian Botanic Garden which features over 3,000 species of native flora, and discover walking trails like the [Lotterywest Federation Walkway](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/11f1lbdhff&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBBAH) , which includes a treetop walk . The park also contains various children's play areas, barbecue facilities, and monuments such as the [State War Memorial](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/1w604csr&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBBAJ).
- **[Rottnest Island](https://www.google.com/search?q=Rottnest+Island&kgmid=/m/01fmx4&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQ3egRegQIBBAM)** : Just a short ferry ride from Perth or Fremantle, this island is home to the famous quokkas. With 63 white-sand beaches and 20 bays, you can spend time swimming and snorkelling . Other activities include cycling, hiking the Wadjemup Bidi trails, guided Segway tours, and skydiving.
- **[Swan River](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/0mg9j&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBBAQ)** : Explore the waterways with a river cruise, which often depart from [Barrack Street Jetty](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/11ngj7jcvf&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBBAS) . You can also rent kayaks to paddle along the Canning River, where you can see waterbirds and natural vegetation.
- **Beaches** : Enjoy Perth's beautiful coastline, with numerous beaches perfect for swimming, surfing, and relaxing. Popular options include [Cottesloe Beach](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/11shf3bqjf&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBBAV) , known for its pristine sand and clear water, and [Scarborough Beach](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/1q62bcb3k&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBBAX) , with its vibrant foreshore and dining options.
- **[Elizabeth Quay](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/0k0jptp&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBBAa)** : Take a cultural walking tour or simply enjoy the public art and city views at this vibrant waterfront precinct . You can also see the [Bell Tower](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/07dd0h&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBBAc) here, which is celebrating its 25th anniversary with a free entry event in December.[[1]](https://www.destinationperth.com.au/explore-perth/perth-city/kings-park/#:~:text=Kings%20Park%20and%20Botanic%20Garden,the%20Kimberley%20region%20of%20WA.)[[2]](https://www.bgpa.wa.gov.au/kings-park#:~:text=Kings%20Park%20is%20both%20one,Kings%20Park%20Bushland)[[3]](https://rottnestexpress.com.au/#:~:text=Just%20a%20short%20ferry%20ride,does%20have%20something%20for%20everyone.)[[4]](https://www.destinationperth.com.au/explore-perth/rottnest-island/#:~:text=You%20won't%20be%20left,backdrop%20to%20your%20forever%20memories.)[[5]](https://www.rottnestisland.com/visit/guides-tips/an-unforgettable-group-getaway-to-rottnest-island)[[6]](https://www.destinationperth.com.au/event/christmas-dinner-cruise/4160/)[[7]](https://megatix.com.au/events/all-abilities-river-cruise)[[8]](https://www.eventbrite.com/e/1963684017758)[[9]](https://allevents.in/perth/elizabeth-quay-cultural-walking-tours/80001491517541)[[10]](https://www.westernaustralia.com/en/event/25th-anniversary-of-the-bell-tower/689c17547eb93ff921a7a4ab)

Arts, culture, and entertainment

- **[Fremantle](https://www.google.com/search?q=Fremantle&kgmid=/m/012q8y&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQ3egRegQIBxAC)** : This historic port city has a distinct character with colonial architecture and a bustling creative scene . You can browse local artisan goods at the Bazaar Makers Market in early December or visit one of the many cafes, pubs, and restaurants.
- **Events and Markets** : Search for one-off events like the *FOMO Festive Fair* in Fremantle or the *Bayswater Twilight Market* . You can also catch a live show, with options ranging from jazz at [The Ellington Jazz Club](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/0k529bx&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBxAG) to a Beatles tribute on a river cruise.
- **Museums** : Visit [Scitech](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/0ffw5f&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBxAJ) for a hands-on science experience or the [Wadjemup Museum](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/11cjpcgxs3&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBxAL) on Rottnest Island to learn about the island's unique history and Aboriginal culture . The [Fremantle Arts Centre](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/0d4yqf&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBxAN) is another option for art classes, curator tours, and live music.[[1]](https://www.facebook.com/events/1471858014105645/?acontext=%7B%22action_history%22%3A%22null%22%7D&ref_source=newsfeed&ref_mechanism=feed_attachment)[[2]](https://www.eventbrite.com/e/1966807331674)[[3]](https://www.facebook.com/events/10-william-st-fremantle-wa-australia-western-australia-6160/fomo-festive-fair/1419132312509181/)[[4]](https://www.facebook.com/events/bert-wright-park-king-william-street-bayswater-perth-wa-australia-western-austra/bayswater-twilight-market/1286412152937331/)[[5]](https://www.facebook.com/events/1824862041479846/?acontext=%7B%22action_history%22%3A%22null%22%7D&ref_source=newsfeed&ref_mechanism=feed_attachment)[[6]](https://www.facebook.com/events/964171005793931)[[7]](https://www.facebook.com/events/scitech/planetarium-experience-pink-floyds-dark-side-of-the-moon/605423132501478/)[[8]](https://www.destinationperth.com.au/explore-perth/rottnest-island/#:~:text=You%20won't%20be%20left,backdrop%20to%20your%20forever%20memories.)

keyword: things to do in perth australia
references_text: A creative family pottery workshop at Not Yet Perfect Studio. Participants will have the opportunity to work with a pottery wheel.
references_markdown:
Outdoor activities

- **[Kings Park](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/07kc_b&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBBAC) and [Botanic Garden](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/07kc_b&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBBAE)** : This large inner-city park is an essential destination for both visitors and locals . You can admire panoramic views of the Perth skyline and Swan River, explore the Western Australian Botanic Garden which features over 3,000 species of native flora, and discover walking trails like the [Lotterywest Federation Walkway](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/11f1lbdhff&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBBAH) , which includes a treetop walk . The park also contains various children's play areas, barbecue facilities, and monuments such as the [State War Memorial](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/1w604csr&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBBAJ).
- **[Rottnest Island](https://www.google.com/search?q=Rottnest+Island&kgmid=/m/01fmx4&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQ3egRegQIBBAM)** : Just a short ferry ride from Perth or Fremantle, this island is home to the famous quokkas. With 63 white-sand beaches and 20 bays, you can spend time swimming and snorkelling . Other activities include cycling, hiking the Wadjemup Bidi trails, guided Segway tours, and skydiving.
- **[Swan River](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/0mg9j&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBBAQ)** : Explore the waterways with a river cruise, which often depart from [Barrack Street Jetty](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/11ngj7jcvf&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBBAS) . You can also rent kayaks to paddle along the Canning River, where you can see waterbirds and natural vegetation.
- **Beaches** : Enjoy Perth's beautiful coastline, with numerous beaches perfect for swimming, surfing, and relaxing. Popular options include [Cottesloe Beach](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/11shf3bqjf&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBBAV) , known for its pristine sand and clear water, and [Scarborough Beach](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/1q62bcb3k&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBBAX) , with its vibrant foreshore and dining options.
- **[Elizabeth Quay](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/0k0jptp&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBBAa)** : Take a cultural walking tour or simply enjoy the public art and city views at this vibrant waterfront precinct . You can also see the [Bell Tower](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/07dd0h&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBBAc) here, which is celebrating its 25th anniversary with a free entry event in December.[[1]](https://www.destinationperth.com.au/explore-perth/perth-city/kings-park/#:~:text=Kings%20Park%20and%20Botanic%20Garden,the%20Kimberley%20region%20of%20WA.)[[2]](https://www.bgpa.wa.gov.au/kings-park#:~:text=Kings%20Park%20is%20both%20one,Kings%20Park%20Bushland)[[3]](https://rottnestexpress.com.au/#:~:text=Just%20a%20short%20ferry%20ride,does%20have%20something%20for%20everyone.)[[4]](https://www.destinationperth.com.au/explore-perth/rottnest-island/#:~:text=You%20won't%20be%20left,backdrop%20to%20your%20forever%20memories.)[[5]](https://www.rottnestisland.com/visit/guides-tips/an-unforgettable-group-getaway-to-rottnest-island)[[6]](https://www.destinationperth.com.au/event/christmas-dinner-cruise/4160/)[[7]](https://megatix.com.au/events/all-abilities-river-cruise)[[8]](https://www.eventbrite.com/e/1963684017758)[[9]](https://allevents.in/perth/elizabeth-quay-cultural-walking-tours/80001491517541)[[10]](https://www.westernaustralia.com/en/event/25th-anniversary-of-the-bell-tower/689c17547eb93ff921a7a4ab)

Arts, culture, and entertainment

- **[Fremantle](https://www.google.com/search?q=Fremantle&kgmid=/m/012q8y&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQ3egRegQIBxAC)** : This historic port city has a distinct character with colonial architecture and a bustling creative scene . You can browse local artisan goods at the Bazaar Makers Market in early December or visit one of the many cafes, pubs, and restaurants.
- **Events and Markets** : Search for one-off events like the *FOMO Festive Fair* in Fremantle or the *Bayswater Twilight Market* . You can also catch a live show, with options ranging from jazz at [The Ellington Jazz Club](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/0k529bx&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBxAG) to a Beatles tribute on a river cruise.
- **Museums** : Visit [Scitech](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/0ffw5f&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBxAJ) for a hands-on science experience or the [Wadjemup Museum](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/11cjpcgxs3&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBxAL) on Rottnest Island to learn about the island's unique history and Aboriginal culture . The [Fremantle Arts Centre](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/0d4yqf&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBxAN) is another option for art classes, curator tours, and live music.[[1]](https://www.facebook.com/events/1471858014105645/?acontext=%7B%22action_history%22%3A%22null%22%7D&ref_source=newsfeed&ref_mechanism=feed_attachment)[[2]](https://www.eventbrite.com/e/1966807331674)[[3]](https://www.facebook.com/events/10-william-st-fremantle-wa-australia-western-australia-6160/fomo-festive-fair/1419132312509181/)[[4]](https://www.facebook.com/events/bert-wright-park-king-william-street-bayswater-perth-wa-australia-western-austra/bayswater-twilight-market/1286412152937331/)[[5]](https://www.facebook.com/events/1824862041479846/?acontext=%7B%22action_history%22%3A%22null%22%7D&ref_source=newsfeed&ref_mechanism=feed_attachment)[[6]](https://www.facebook.com/events/964171005793931)[[7]](https://www.facebook.com/events/scitech/planetarium-experience-pink-floyds-dark-side-of-the-moon/605423132501478/)[[8]](https://www.destinationperth.com.au/explore-perth/rottnest-island/#:~:text=You%20won't%20be%20left,backdrop%20to%20your%20forever%20memories.)

keyword: things to do in perth australia
references_text: A family fun day centered around teddy bears, featuring activities such as designing and decorating custom t-shirts for teddy bear...
references_markdown:
Outdoor activities

- **[Kings Park](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/07kc_b&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBBAC) and [Botanic Garden](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/07kc_b&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBBAE)** : This large inner-city park is an essential destination for both visitors and locals . You can admire panoramic views of the Perth skyline and Swan River, explore the Western Australian Botanic Garden which features over 3,000 species of native flora, and discover walking trails like the [Lotterywest Federation Walkway](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/11f1lbdhff&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBBAH) , which includes a treetop walk . The park also contains various children's play areas, barbecue facilities, and monuments such as the [State War Memorial](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/1w604csr&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBBAJ).
- **[Rottnest Island](https://www.google.com/search?q=Rottnest+Island&kgmid=/m/01fmx4&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQ3egRegQIBBAM)** : Just a short ferry ride from Perth or Fremantle, this island is home to the famous quokkas. With 63 white-sand beaches and 20 bays, you can spend time swimming and snorkelling . Other activities include cycling, hiking the Wadjemup Bidi trails, guided Segway tours, and skydiving.
- **[Swan River](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/0mg9j&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBBAQ)** : Explore the waterways with a river cruise, which often depart from [Barrack Street Jetty](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/11ngj7jcvf&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBBAS) . You can also rent kayaks to paddle along the Canning River, where you can see waterbirds and natural vegetation.
- **Beaches** : Enjoy Perth's beautiful coastline, with numerous beaches perfect for swimming, surfing, and relaxing. Popular options include [Cottesloe Beach](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/11shf3bqjf&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBBAV) , known for its pristine sand and clear water, and [Scarborough Beach](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/1q62bcb3k&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBBAX) , with its vibrant foreshore and dining options.
- **[Elizabeth Quay](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/0k0jptp&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBBAa)** : Take a cultural walking tour or simply enjoy the public art and city views at this vibrant waterfront precinct . You can also see the [Bell Tower](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/07dd0h&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBBAc) here, which is celebrating its 25th anniversary with a free entry event in December.[[1]](https://www.destinationperth.com.au/explore-perth/perth-city/kings-park/#:~:text=Kings%20Park%20and%20Botanic%20Garden,the%20Kimberley%20region%20of%20WA.)[[2]](https://www.bgpa.wa.gov.au/kings-park#:~:text=Kings%20Park%20is%20both%20one,Kings%20Park%20Bushland)[[3]](https://rottnestexpress.com.au/#:~:text=Just%20a%20short%20ferry%20ride,does%20have%20something%20for%20everyone.)[[4]](https://www.destinationperth.com.au/explore-perth/rottnest-island/#:~:text=You%20won't%20be%20left,backdrop%20to%20your%20forever%20memories.)[[5]](https://www.rottnestisland.com/visit/guides-tips/an-unforgettable-group-getaway-to-rottnest-island)[[6]](https://www.destinationperth.com.au/event/christmas-dinner-cruise/4160/)[[7]](https://megatix.com.au/events/all-abilities-river-cruise)[[8]](https://www.eventbrite.com/e/1963684017758)[[9]](https://allevents.in/perth/elizabeth-quay-cultural-walking-tours/80001491517541)[[10]](https://www.westernaustralia.com/en/event/25th-anniversary-of-the-bell-tower/689c17547eb93ff921a7a4ab)

Arts, culture, and entertainment

- **[Fremantle](https://www.google.com/search?q=Fremantle&kgmid=/m/012q8y&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQ3egRegQIBxAC)** : This historic port city has a distinct character with colonial architecture and a bustling creative scene . You can browse local artisan goods at the Bazaar Makers Market in early December or visit one of the many cafes, pubs, and restaurants.
- **Events and Markets** : Search for one-off events like the *FOMO Festive Fair* in Fremantle or the *Bayswater Twilight Market* . You can also catch a live show, with options ranging from jazz at [The Ellington Jazz Club](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/0k529bx&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBxAG) to a Beatles tribute on a river cruise.
- **Museums** : Visit [Scitech](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/0ffw5f&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBxAJ) for a hands-on science experience or the [Wadjemup Museum](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/11cjpcgxs3&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBxAL) on Rottnest Island to learn about the island's unique history and Aboriginal culture . The [Fremantle Arts Centre](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/0d4yqf&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBxAN) is another option for art classes, curator tours, and live music.[[1]](https://www.facebook.com/events/1471858014105645/?acontext=%7B%22action_history%22%3A%22null%22%7D&ref_source=newsfeed&ref_mechanism=feed_attachment)[[2]](https://www.eventbrite.com/e/1966807331674)[[3]](https://www.facebook.com/events/10-william-st-fremantle-wa-australia-western-australia-6160/fomo-festive-fair/1419132312509181/)[[4]](https://www.facebook.com/events/bert-wright-park-king-william-street-bayswater-perth-wa-australia-western-austra/bayswater-twilight-market/1286412152937331/)[[5]](https://www.facebook.com/events/1824862041479846/?acontext=%7B%22action_history%22%3A%22null%22%7D&ref_source=newsfeed&ref_mechanism=feed_attachment)[[6]](https://www.facebook.com/events/964171005793931)[[7]](https://www.facebook.com/events/scitech/planetarium-experience-pink-floyds-dark-side-of-the-moon/605423132501478/)[[8]](https://www.destinationperth.com.au/explore-perth/rottnest-island/#:~:text=You%20won't%20be%20left,backdrop%20to%20your%20forever%20memories.)

See more

Family-friendly activities

- **Pottery Workshop** : Get creative with the whole family at a pottery workshop at the [Not Yet Perfect Pottery Studio](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/11ptlh6chs&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIChAC) in Applecross.
- **Family Fun Day** : Look for family-oriented events like the *Teddy Bears Picnic* at [BrewDog Perth](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/11vjvpw9vw&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIChAF) or the *Family Sundays* at [Kings Park and Botanic Garden](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/07kc_b&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIChAH).
- **Theater** : Take the family to see a production like *Cinderella* at [His Majesty's Theatre](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/0c494p&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIChAK) in Perth.
- **Nature Play** : At [Kings Park](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/07kc_b&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIChAN) , children can connect with nature at [Rio Tinto Naturescape](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/11c1qbs_py&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIChAP) , a place for children to learn about the environment.[[1]](https://www.notyetperfect.com/event-details/family-pottery-workshop-wheel-work-2025-11-30-12-30-1)[[2]](https://brewdogperth.com.au/events/teddy-bears-picnic/)[[3]](https://www.westernaustralia.com/en/event/warrior-world%3A-family-sundays/68538ca9a86647e01658c913)[[4]](https://limelight-arts.com.au/event/cinderella/2025-11-28/)[[5]](https://www.destinationperth.com.au/explore-perth/perth-city/kings-park/#:~:text=Kings%20Park%20and%20Botanic%20Garden,the%20Kimberley%20region%20of%20WA.)

Popular options include [Cottesloe Beach](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/11shf3bqjf&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBBAV) , known for its pristine sand and clear water, and [Scarborough Beach](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/1q62bcb3k&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBBAX) , with its vibrant foreshore and dining options.
- **[Elizabeth Quay](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/0k0jptp&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBBAa)** : Take a cultural walking tour or simply enjoy the public art and city views at this vibrant waterfront precinct . You can also see the [Bell Tower](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/07dd0h&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBBAc) here, which is celebrating its 25th anniversary with a free entry event in December.[[1]](https://www.destinationperth.com.au/explore-perth/perth-city/kings-park/#:~:text=Kings%20Park%20and%20Botanic%20Garden,the%20Kimberley%20region%20of%20WA.)[[2]](https://www.bgpa.wa.gov.au/kings-park#:~:text=Kings%20Park%20is%20both%20one,Kings%20Park%20Bushland)[[3]](https://rottnestexpress.com.au/#:~:text=Just%20a%20short%20ferry%20ride,does%20have%20something%20for%20everyone.)[[4]](https://www.destinationperth.com.au/explore-perth/rottnest-island/#:~:text=You%20won't%20be%20left,backdrop%20to%20your%20forever%20memories.)[[5]](https://www.rottnestisland.com/visit/guides-tips/an-unforgettable-group-getaway-to-rottnest-island)[[6]](https://www.destinationperth.com.au/event/christmas-dinner-cruise/4160/)[[7]](https://megatix.com.au/events/all-abilities-river-cruise)[[8]](https://www.eventbrite.com/e/1963684017758)[[9]](https://allevents.in/perth/elizabeth-quay-cultural-walking-tours/80001491517541)[[10]](https://www.westernaustralia.com/en/event/25th-anniversary-of-the-bell-tower/689c17547eb93ff921a7a4ab)

Arts, culture, and entertainment

- **[Fremantle](https://www.google.com/search?q=Fremantle&kgmid=/m/012q8y&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQ3egRegQIBxAC)** : This historic port city has a distinct character with colonial architecture and a bustling creative scene . You can browse local artisan goods at the Bazaar Makers Market in early December or visit one of the many cafes, pubs, and restaurants.
- **Events and Markets** : Search for one-off events like the *FOMO Festive Fair* in Fremantle or the *Bayswater Twilight Market* . You can also catch a live show, with options ranging from jazz at [The Ellington Jazz Club](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/0k529bx&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBxAG) to a Beatles tribute on a river cruise.
- **Museums** : Visit [Scitech](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/0ffw5f&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBxAJ) for a hands-on science experience or the [Wadjemup Museum](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/11cjpcgxs3&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBxAL) on Rottnest Island to learn about the island's unique history and Aboriginal culture . The [Fremantle Arts Centre](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/0d4yqf&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBxAN) is another option for art classes, curator tours, and live music.[[1]](https://www.facebook.com/events/1471858014105645/?acontext=%7B%22action_history%22%3A%22null%22%7D&ref_source=newsfeed&ref_mechanism=feed_attachment)[[2]](https://www.eventbrite.com/e/1966807331674)[[3]](https://www.facebook.com/events/10-william-st-fremantle-wa-australia-western-australia-6160/fomo-festive-fair/1419132312509181/)[[4]](https://www.facebook.com/events/bert-wright-park-king-william-street-bayswater-perth-wa-australia-western-austra/bayswater-twilight-market/1286412152937331/)[[5]](https://www.facebook.com/events/1824862041479846/?acontext=%7B%22action_history%22%3A%22null%22%7D&ref_source=newsfeed&ref_mechanism=feed_attachment)[[6]](https://www.facebook.com/events/964171005793931)[[7]](https://www.facebook.com/events/scitech/planetarium-experience-pink-floyds-dark-side-of-the-moon/605423132501478/)[[8]](https://www.destinationperth.com.au/explore-perth/rottnest-island/#:~:text=You%20won't%20be%20left,backdrop%20to%20your%20forever%20memories.)

Family-friendly activities

- **Pottery Workshop** : Get creative with the whole family at a pottery workshop at the [Not Yet Perfect Pottery Studio](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/11ptlh6chs&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIChAC) in Applecross.
- **Family Fun Day** : Look for family-oriented events like the *Teddy Bears Picnic* at [BrewDog Perth](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/11vjvpw9vw&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIChAF) or the *Family Sundays* at [Kings Park and Botanic Garden](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/07kc_b&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIChAH).
- **Theater** : Take the family to see a production like *Cinderella* at [His Majesty's Theatre](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/0c494p&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIChAK) in Perth.
- **Nature Play** : At [Kings Park](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/07kc_b&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIChAN) , children can connect with nature at [Rio Tinto Naturescape](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/11c1qbs_py&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIChAP) , a place for children to learn about the environment.[[1]](https://www.notyetperfect.com/event-details/family-pottery-workshop-wheel-work-2025-11-30-12-30-1)[[2]](https://brewdogperth.com.au/events/teddy-bears-picnic/)[[3]](https://www.westernaustralia.com/en/event/warrior-world%3A-family-sundays/68538ca9a86647e01658c913)[[4]](https://limelight-arts.com.au/event/cinderella/2025-11-28/)[[5]](https://www.destinationperth.com.au/explore-perth/perth-city/kings-park/#:~:text=Kings%20Park%20and%20Botanic%20Garden,the%20Kimberley%20region%20of%20WA.)

references_markdown:
Outdoor activities

- **[Kings Park](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/07kc_b&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBBAC) and [Botanic Garden](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/07kc_b&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBBAE)** : This large inner-city park is an essential destination for both visitors and locals . You can admire panoramic views of the Perth skyline and Swan River, explore the Western Australian Botanic Garden which features over 3,000 species of native flora, and discover walking trails like the [Lotterywest Federation Walkway](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/11f1lbdhff&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBBAH) , which includes a treetop walk . The park also contains various children's play areas, barbecue facilities, and monuments such as the [State War Memorial](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/1w604csr&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBBAJ).
- **[Rottnest Island](https://www.google.com/search?q=Rottnest+Island&kgmid=/m/01fmx4&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQ3egRegQIBBAM)** : Just a short ferry ride from Perth or Fremantle, this island is home to the famous quokkas. With 63 white-sand beaches and 20 bays, you can spend time swimming and snorkelling . Other activities include cycling, hiking the Wadjemup Bidi trails, guided Segway tours, and skydiving.
- **[Swan River](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/0mg9j&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBBAQ)** : Explore the waterways with a river cruise, which often depart from [Barrack Street Jetty](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/11ngj7jcvf&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBBAS) . You can also rent kayaks to paddle along the Canning River, where you can see waterbirds and natural vegetation.
- **Beaches** : Enjoy Perth's beautiful coastline, with numerous beaches perfect for swimming, surfing, and relaxing. Popular options include [Cottesloe Beach](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/11shf3bqjf&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBBAV) , known for its pristine sand and clear water, and [Scarborough Beach](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/1q62bcb3k&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBBAX) , with its vibrant foreshore and dining options.
- **[Elizabeth Quay](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/0k0jptp&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBBAa)** : Take a cultural walking tour or simply enjoy the public art and city views at this vibrant waterfront precinct . You can also see the [Bell Tower](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/07dd0h&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBBAc) here, which is celebrating its 25th anniversary with a free entry event in December.[[1]](https://www.destinationperth.com.au/explore-perth/perth-city/kings-park/#:~:text=Kings%20Park%20and%20Botanic%20Garden,the%20Kimberley%20region%20of%20WA.)[[2]](https://www.bgpa.wa.gov.au/kings-park#:~:text=Kings%20Park%20is%20both%20one,Kings%20Park%20Bushland)[[3]](https://rottnestexpress.com.au/#:~:text=Just%20a%20short%20ferry%20ride,does%20have%20something%20for%20everyone.)[[4]](https://www.destinationperth.com.au/explore-perth/rottnest-island/#:~:text=You%20won't%20be%20left,backdrop%20to%20your%20forever%20memories.)[[5]](https://www.rottnestisland.com/visit/guides-tips/an-unforgettable-group-getaway-to-rottnest-island)[[6]](https://www.destinationperth.com.au/event/christmas-dinner-cruise/4160/)[[7]](https://megatix.com.au/events/all-abilities-river-cruise)[[8]](https://www.eventbrite.com/e/1963684017758)[[9]](https://allevents.in/perth/elizabeth-quay-cultural-walking-tours/80001491517541)[[10]](https://www.westernaustralia.com/en/event/25th-anniversary-of-the-bell-tower/689c17547eb93ff921a7a4ab)

Arts, culture, and entertainment

- **[Fremantle](https://www.google.com/search?q=Fremantle&kgmid=/m/012q8y&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQ3egRegQIBxAC)** : This historic port city has a distinct character with colonial architecture and a bustling creative scene . You can browse local artisan goods at the Bazaar Makers Market in early December or visit one of the many cafes, pubs, and restaurants.
- **Events and Markets** : Search for one-off events like the *FOMO Festive Fair* in Fremantle or the *Bayswater Twilight Market* . You can also catch a live show, with options ranging from jazz at [The Ellington Jazz Club](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/0k529bx&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBxAG) to a Beatles tribute on a river cruise.
- **Museums** : Visit [Scitech](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/0ffw5f&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBxAJ) for a hands-on science experience or the [Wadjemup Museum](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/11cjpcgxs3&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBxAL) on Rottnest Island to learn about the island's unique history and Aboriginal culture . The [Fremantle Arts Centre](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/0d4yqf&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBxAN) is another option for art classes, curator tours, and live music.[[1]](https://www.facebook.com/events/1471858014105645/?acontext=%7B%22action_history%22%3A%22null%22%7D&ref_source=newsfeed&ref_mechanism=feed_attachment)[[2]](https://www.eventbrite.com/e/1966807331674)[[3]](https://www.facebook.com/events/10-william-st-fremantle-wa-australia-western-australia-6160/fomo-festive-fair/1419132312509181/)[[4]](https://www.facebook.com/events/bert-wright-park-king-william-street-bayswater-perth-wa-australia-western-austra/bayswater-twilight-market/1286412152937331/)[[5]](https://www.facebook.com/events/1824862041479846/?acontext=%7B%22action_history%22%3A%22null%22%7D&ref_source=newsfeed&ref_mechanism=feed_attachment)[[6]](https://www.facebook.com/events/964171005793931)[[7]](https://www.facebook.com/events/scitech/planetarium-experience-pink-floyds-dark-side-of-the-moon/605423132501478/)[[8]](https://www.destinationperth.com.au/explore-perth/rottnest-island/#:~:text=You%20won't%20be%20left,backdrop%20to%20your%20forever%20memories.)

Family-friendly activities

- **Pottery Workshop** : Get creative with the whole family at a pottery workshop at the [Not Yet Perfect Pottery Studio](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/11ptlh6chs&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIChAC) in Applecross.
- **Family Fun Day** : Look for family-oriented events like the *Teddy Bears Picnic* at [BrewDog Perth](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/11vjvpw9vw&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIChAF) or the *Family Sundays* at [Kings Park and Botanic Garden](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/07kc_b&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIChAH).
- **Theater** : Take the family to see a production like *Cinderella* at [His Majesty's Theatre](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/0c494p&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIChAK) in Perth.
- **Nature Play** : At [Kings Park](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/07kc_b&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIChAN) , children can connect with nature at [Rio Tinto Naturescape](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/11c1qbs_py&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIChAP) , a place for children to learn about the environment.[[1]](https://www.notyetperfect.com/event-details/family-pottery-workshop-wheel-work-2025-11-30-12-30-1)[[2]](https://brewdogperth.com.au/events/teddy-bears-picnic/)[[3]](https://www.westernaustralia.com/en/event/warrior-world%3A-family-sundays/68538ca9a86647e01658c913)[[4]](https://limelight-arts.com.au/event/cinderella/2025-11-28/)[[5]](https://www.destinationperth.com.au/explore-perth/perth-city/kings-park/#:~:text=Kings%20Park%20and%20Botanic%20Garden,the%20Kimberley%20region%20of%20WA.)

references_text: Kings Park. Kings Park and Botanic Garden is one of the largest inner city parks in the world and is visited by nearly 6 million p...
references_markdown:
Outdoor activities

- **[Kings Park](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/07kc_b&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBBAC) and [Botanic Garden](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/07kc_b&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBBAE)** : This large inner-city park is an essential destination for both visitors and locals . You can admire panoramic views of the Perth skyline and Swan River, explore the Western Australian Botanic Garden which features over 3,000 species of native flora, and discover walking trails like the [Lotterywest Federation Walkway](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/11f1lbdhff&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBBAH) , which includes a treetop walk . The park also contains various children's play areas, barbecue facilities, and monuments such as the [State War Memorial](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/1w604csr&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBBAJ).
- **[Rottnest Island](https://www.google.com/search?q=Rottnest+Island&kgmid=/m/01fmx4&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQ3egRegQIBBAM)** : Just a short ferry ride from Perth or Fremantle, this island is home to the famous quokkas. With 63 white-sand beaches and 20 bays, you can spend time swimming and snorkelling . Other activities include cycling, hiking the Wadjemup Bidi trails, guided Segway tours, and skydiving.
- **[Swan River](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/0mg9j&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBBAQ)** : Explore the waterways with a river cruise, which often depart from [Barrack Street Jetty](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/11ngj7jcvf&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBBAS) . You can also rent kayaks to paddle along the Canning River, where you can see waterbirds and natural vegetation.
- **Beaches** : Enjoy Perth's beautiful coastline, with numerous beaches perfect for swimming, surfing, and relaxing. Popular options include [Cottesloe Beach](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/11shf3bqjf&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBBAV) , known for its pristine sand and clear water, and [Scarborough Beach](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/1q62bcb3k&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBBAX) , with its vibrant foreshore and dining options.
- **[Elizabeth Quay](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/0k0jptp&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBBAa)** : Take a cultural walking tour or simply enjoy the public art and city views at this vibrant waterfront precinct . You can also see the [Bell Tower](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/07dd0h&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBBAc) here, which is celebrating its 25th anniversary with a free entry event in December.[[1]](https://www.destinationperth.com.au/explore-perth/perth-city/kings-park/#:~:text=Kings%20Park%20and%20Botanic%20Garden,the%20Kimberley%20region%20of%20WA.)[[2]](https://www.bgpa.wa.gov.au/kings-park#:~:text=Kings%20Park%20is%20both%20one,Kings%20Park%20Bushland)[[3]](https://rottnestexpress.com.au/#:~:text=Just%20a%20short%20ferry%20ride,does%20have%20something%20for%20everyone.)[[4]](https://www.destinationperth.com.au/explore-perth/rottnest-island/#:~:text=You%20won't%20be%20left,backdrop%20to%20your%20forever%20memories.)[[5]](https://www.rottnestisland.com/visit/guides-tips/an-unforgettable-group-getaway-to-rottnest-island)[[6]](https://www.destinationperth.com.au/event/christmas-dinner-cruise/4160/)[[7]](https://megatix.com.au/events/all-abilities-river-cruise)[[8]](https://www.eventbrite.com/e/1963684017758)[[9]](https://allevents.in/perth/elizabeth-quay-cultural-walking-tours/80001491517541)[[10]](https://www.westernaustralia.com/en/event/25th-anniversary-of-the-bell-tower/689c17547eb93ff921a7a4ab)

Arts, culture, and entertainment

- **[Fremantle](https://www.google.com/search?q=Fremantle&kgmid=/m/012q8y&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQ3egRegQIBxAC)** : This historic port city has a distinct character with colonial architecture and a bustling creative scene . You can browse local artisan goods at the Bazaar Makers Market in early December or visit one of the many cafes, pubs, and restaurants.
- **Events and Markets** : Search for one-off events like the *FOMO Festive Fair* in Fremantle or the *Bayswater Twilight Market* . You can also catch a live show, with options ranging from jazz at [The Ellington Jazz Club](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/0k529bx&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBxAG) to a Beatles tribute on a river cruise.
- **Museums** : Visit [Scitech](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/0ffw5f&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBxAJ) for a hands-on science experience or the [Wadjemup Museum](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/11cjpcgxs3&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBxAL) on Rottnest Island to learn about the island's unique history and Aboriginal culture . The [Fremantle Arts Centre](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/0d4yqf&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBxAN) is another option for art classes, curator tours, and live music.[[1]](https://www.facebook.com/events/1471858014105645/?acontext=%7B%22action_history%22%3A%22null%22%7D&ref_source=newsfeed&ref_mechanism=feed_attachment)[[2]](https://www.eventbrite.com/e/1966807331674)[[3]](https://www.facebook.com/events/10-william-st-fremantle-wa-australia-western-australia-6160/fomo-festive-fair/1419132312509181/)[[4]](https://www.facebook.com/events/bert-wright-park-king-william-street-bayswater-perth-wa-australia-western-austra/bayswater-twilight-market/1286412152937331/)[[5]](https://www.facebook.com/events/1824862041479846/?acontext=%7B%22action_history%22%3A%22null%22%7D&ref_source=newsfeed&ref_mechanism=feed_attachment)[[6]](https://www.facebook.com/events/964171005793931)[[7]](https://www.facebook.com/events/scitech/planetarium-experience-pink-floyds-dark-side-of-the-moon/605423132501478/)[[8]](https://www.destinationperth.com.au/explore-perth/rottnest-island/#:~:text=You%20won't%20be%20left,backdrop%20to%20your%20forever%20memories.)

Family-friendly activities

- **Pottery Workshop** : Get creative with the whole family at a pottery workshop at the [Not Yet Perfect Pottery Studio](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/11ptlh6chs&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIChAC) in Applecross.
- **Family Fun Day** : Look for family-oriented events like the *Teddy Bears Picnic* at [BrewDog Perth](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/11vjvpw9vw&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIChAF) or the *Family Sundays* at [Kings Park and Botanic Garden](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/07kc_b&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIChAH).
- **Theater** : Take the family to see a production like *Cinderella* at [His Majesty's Theatre](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/0c494p&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIChAK) in Perth.
- **Nature Play** : At [Kings Park](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/07kc_b&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIChAN) , children can connect with nature at [Rio Tinto Naturescape](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/11c1qbs_py&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIChAP) , a place for children to learn about the environment.[[1]](https://www.notyetperfect.com/event-details/family-pottery-workshop-wheel-work-2025-11-30-12-30-1)[[2]](https://brewdogperth.com.au/events/teddy-bears-picnic/)[[3]](https://www.westernaustralia.com/en/event/warrior-world%3A-family-sundays/68538ca9a86647e01658c913)[[4]](https://limelight-arts.com.au/event/cinderella/2025-11-28/)[[5]](https://www.destinationperth.com.au/explore-perth/perth-city/kings-park/#:~:text=Kings%20Park%20and%20Botanic%20Garden,the%20Kimberley%20region%20of%20WA.)

keyword: things to do in perth australia
references_text: An unforgettable group getaway to Rottnest Island. Make the most of your time on Wadjemup / Rottnest Island with mates for a visit...
references_markdown:
Outdoor activities

- **[Kings Park](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/07kc_b&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBBAC) and [Botanic Garden](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/07kc_b&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBBAE)** : This large inner-city park is an essential destination for both visitors and locals . You can admire panoramic views of the Perth skyline and Swan River, explore the Western Australian Botanic Garden which features over 3,000 species of native flora, and discover walking trails like the [Lotterywest Federation Walkway](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/11f1lbdhff&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBBAH) , which includes a treetop walk . The park also contains various children's play areas, barbecue facilities, and monuments such as the [State War Memorial](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/1w604csr&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBBAJ).
- **[Rottnest Island](https://www.google.com/search?q=Rottnest+Island&kgmid=/m/01fmx4&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQ3egRegQIBBAM)** : Just a short ferry ride from Perth or Fremantle, this island is home to the famous quokkas. With 63 white-sand beaches and 20 bays, you can spend time swimming and snorkelling . Other activities include cycling, hiking the Wadjemup Bidi trails, guided Segway tours, and skydiving.
- **[Swan River](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/0mg9j&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBBAQ)** : Explore the waterways with a river cruise, which often depart from [Barrack Street Jetty](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/11ngj7jcvf&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBBAS) . You can also rent kayaks to paddle along the Canning River, where you can see waterbirds and natural vegetation.
- **Beaches** : Enjoy Perth's beautiful coastline, with numerous beaches perfect for swimming, surfing, and relaxing. Popular options include [Cottesloe Beach](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/11shf3bqjf&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBBAV) , known for its pristine sand and clear water, and [Scarborough Beach](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/1q62bcb3k&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBBAX) , with its vibrant foreshore and dining options.
- **[Elizabeth Quay](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/0k0jptp&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBBAa)** : Take a cultural walking tour or simply enjoy the public art and city views at this vibrant waterfront precinct . You can also see the [Bell Tower](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/07dd0h&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBBAc) here, which is celebrating its 25th anniversary with a free entry event in December.[[1]](https://www.destinationperth.com.au/explore-perth/perth-city/kings-park/#:~:text=Kings%20Park%20and%20Botanic%20Garden,the%20Kimberley%20region%20of%20WA.)[[2]](https://www.bgpa.wa.gov.au/kings-park#:~:text=Kings%20Park%20is%20both%20one,Kings%20Park%20Bushland)[[3]](https://rottnestexpress.com.au/#:~:text=Just%20a%20short%20ferry%20ride,does%20have%20something%20for%20everyone.)[[4]](https://www.destinationperth.com.au/explore-perth/rottnest-island/#:~:text=You%20won't%20be%20left,backdrop%20to%20your%20forever%20memories.)[[5]](https://www.rottnestisland.com/visit/guides-tips/an-unforgettable-group-getaway-to-rottnest-island)[[6]](https://www.destinationperth.com.au/event/christmas-dinner-cruise/4160/)[[7]](https://megatix.com.au/events/all-abilities-river-cruise)[[8]](https://www.eventbrite.com/e/1963684017758)[[9]](https://allevents.in/perth/elizabeth-quay-cultural-walking-tours/80001491517541)[[10]](https://www.westernaustralia.com/en/event/25th-anniversary-of-the-bell-tower/689c17547eb93ff921a7a4ab)

Kings Park | Destination Perth Kings Park. Make the most of your time on Wadjemup / Rottnest Island with mates for a visit...![](https://api.dataforseo.com/cdn/i/11280103-6179-0139-0000-76f6d9c747dd:14)
Rottnest Island![](https://api.dataforseo.com/cdn/i/11280103-6179-0139-0000-76f6d9c747dd:15)

Arts, culture, and entertainment

- **[Fremantle](https://www.google.com/search?q=Fremantle&kgmid=/m/012q8y&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQ3egRegQIBxAC)** : This historic port city has a distinct character with colonial architecture and a bustling creative scene . You can browse local artisan goods at the Bazaar Makers Market in early December or visit one of the many cafes, pubs, and restaurants.
- **Events and Markets** : Search for one-off events like the *FOMO Festive Fair* in Fremantle or the *Bayswater Twilight Market* . You can also catch a live show, with options ranging from jazz at [The Ellington Jazz Club](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/0k529bx&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBxAG) to a Beatles tribute on a river cruise.
- **Museums** : Visit [Scitech](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/0ffw5f&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBxAJ) for a hands-on science experience or the [Wadjemup Museum](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/11cjpcgxs3&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBxAL) on Rottnest Island to learn about the island's unique history and Aboriginal culture . The [Fremantle Arts Centre](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/0d4yqf&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIBxAN) is another option for art classes, curator tours, and live music.[[1]](https://www.facebook.com/events/1471858014105645/?acontext=%7B%22action_history%22%3A%22null%22%7D&ref_source=newsfeed&ref_mechanism=feed_attachment)[[2]](https://www.eventbrite.com/e/1966807331674)[[3]](https://www.facebook.com/events/10-william-st-fremantle-wa-australia-western-australia-6160/fomo-festive-fair/1419132312509181/)[[4]](https://www.facebook.com/events/bert-wright-park-king-william-street-bayswater-perth-wa-australia-western-austra/bayswater-twilight-market/1286412152937331/)[[5]](https://www.facebook.com/events/1824862041479846/?acontext=%7B%22action_history%22%3A%22null%22%7D&ref_source=newsfeed&ref_mechanism=feed_attachment)[[6]](https://www.facebook.com/events/964171005793931)[[7]](https://www.facebook.com/events/scitech/planetarium-experience-pink-floyds-dark-side-of-the-moon/605423132501478/)[[8]](https://www.destinationperth.com.au/explore-perth/rottnest-island/#:~:text=You%20won't%20be%20left,backdrop%20to%20your%20forever%20memories.)

Family-friendly activities

- **Pottery Workshop** : Get creative with the whole family at a pottery workshop at the [Not Yet Perfect Pottery Studio](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/11ptlh6chs&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIChAC) in Applecross.
- **Family Fun Day** : Look for family-oriented events like the *Teddy Bears Picnic* at [BrewDog Perth](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/11vjvpw9vw&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIChAF) or the *Family Sundays* at [Kings Park and Botanic Garden](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/07kc_b&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIChAH).
- **Theater** : Take the family to see a production like *Cinderella* at [His Majesty's Theatre](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/0c494p&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIChAK) in Perth.
- **Nature Play** : At [Kings Park](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/m/07kc_b&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIChAN) , children can connect with nature at [Rio Tinto Naturescape](https://google.com/viewer/place?mid=/g/11c1qbs_py&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjszuahuJORAxV_gVYBHbW5JXUQqdYPegQIChAP) , a place for children to learn about the environment.[[1]](https://www.notyetperfect.com/event-details/family-pottery-workshop-wheel-work-2025-11-30-12-30-1)[[2]](https://brewdogperth.com.au/events/teddy-bears-picnic/)[[3]](https://www.westernaustralia.com/en/event/warrior-world%3A-family-sundays/68538ca9a86647e01658c913)[[4]](https://limelight-arts.com.au/event/cinderella/2025-11-28/)[[5]](https://www.destinationperth.com.au/explore-perth/perth-city/kings-park/#:~:text=Kings%20Park%20and%20Botanic%20Garden,the%20Kimberley%20region%20of%20WA.)
